TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN, I INFORM THE FOLLOWING.

“NAN MADOL” WAS AN ANCIENT "REMOTE MINING OUTPOST".

REVIEW THIS REPORT OF 1946 IN PDF PUBLISHED IN GOOGLE,
"Report-on-Mineral-Resources-of-Micronesia-1946",

THE TYPE OF MINERALS THAT ARE LOCATED IN THE MICRONESIA ISLANDS, GO FROM THE BENTONITE WHICH IS USED FOR THE DRILLING IN THE OIL INDUSTRY AND THE LATEST TUNNEL BORING MACHINERY FOR DRILLING TUNNELS, THERE IS ALSO MANGANESE ORE AND PHOSPHATE DEPOSITS.

MANGANESE IS THE 4TH METALLIC ELEMENT USED IN THE PLANET BEHIND IRON, ALUMINUM AND COPPER.

PHOSPHATE IS USED TODAY TO MANUFACTURE CONCENTRATED FOODS FOR FEEDSTOCK, FERTILIZERS, DETERGENTS, AND CHEMICAL PROCESSES TO PRODUCE SUPERPHOSPHATES, PHOSPHORIC ACID, NITROPHOSPHATES WHEN MIXED WITH AMMONIA. SUPERPHOSPHATO TRIPLE (TSP). AMMONIUM MONO PHOSPHATE (MAP) OR DIAMONIO PHOSPHATE (DAP) ARE OBTAINED BY ADDING AMMONIA. THE LIST IS LONG. THE USE OF THESE MINERALS AND THEIR DERIVATIVES IN A CIVILIZATION LIKE OURS OR MORE ADVANCE ARE WIDE ENOUGH AND POSSIBLY UNKNOWN TO US. NOW THE MYSTERY OF NAN MADOL IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE IN THE PACIFIC BEGINS TO MAKE SENSE.

THE OLDEST FACILITIES OF NAN MADOL ARE UNDER THE SEA, OBVIOUSLY THEY ARE ANTEDILUVIANS. THE STACKING OF THE DIFFERENT BASSALT STONE CYLINDERS ARE A MORE RECENT WORK.

THESE SEMI CYLINDRICAL STONES WERE TAKEN FROM THE RUINS UNDERWATER AND OF PREDILUVIAN CONSTRUCTION, THEY WERE IN MORE RECENT TIMES DUG FROM THE ANCIENT CITY SEA BED (REMOTE MINING OUTPOST) AND BROUGHT TO THE PRESENT SITE AND STACKED IN ORGANIZED FORM AND CLASSIFIED BY SECTOR DEPENDING ON WHERE THEY WERE SPECIFICALLY RECOVERED FOR THEIR FUTURE USE. THE WAYS TO STORE THESE COLUMNS THAT WERE EXCAVATED FROM THE SEABED AND STACKED IN THE PRESENT SITE IN THE PRESENT MANNER ALLOWED FOR THE LOCALS TO USE THE SITE FOR OTHER PURPOSES WHILE THEY REMAIN WHERE THEY ARE.

THE SEMI CYLINDRICAL BASSALT STONES OF DIFFERENT DIAMETERS ARE THE RAW MATERIAL USED BY BORING MACHINERY THAT FUNCTIONS LIKE A SILICON GLUE GUN AND THE HOT MELT GLUE STICKS. THE BORING MACHINE MELTED BASSALT STICKS ON THE BACK END WHILE SIMULTANEOUSLY DREDGING OR BORING TUNNEL OR A WIDE UNDERGROUND AND SUBMARINE STRUCTURE, APPLYING THE BASSALT TO REINFORCE STRUCTURES. THE FACT THAT THEY ARE SOMETHING RADIOACTIVE IS NOT A CASUALITY.

IT IS VERY LIKELY THAT AS THE BASSALT STONES WERE RECOVERED, THEY WERE BOMBARDED WITH LOW-RANGE RADIOACTIVE ENERGY BEAMS BEFORE STORING OR INCLUDING BEFORE INTALATION OF THE BASSALT COLUMS, OR THE RADIOACTIVE PARTICLES LEFT ON THE BASSALT COLUMS S WERE ACQUIRED IN THE MELTING AND HARDENING PROCESS, BECAUSE OF THE TECNOLOGY USED FOR HIGH TEMPERATURES ARE URANIUM GENERATORS USED FOR MEKTING AS THEY DO THE BORING PROCESS.

THESE RADIOACTIVE MELTING TECNOLGIES USED ON THIS SITE HAD THE BENEFICIAL BI PRODUCT OF KEEPING AWAY PARASITE MICROLIFE AS ALGIES, MOLLUSK, BARNICLES, CORALS BUILD UP ETC, UNDERS WATER AND ON DRYLAND SUCH AS THEIR CURRENT LOCATION. THIS RADIOACTIVE PESTICIDE OR HERBICIDE ELIMINATES THE PARASITE SUBMARINE AND DRYLAND BIORGANIC AGENTS THAT WOULD STICK TO THE STONES TO MAKE LIFE AND DAMAGE THE STONES WOULD LAST FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS. IT IS LIKELY THAT THIS TECHNOLOGIES WERE APPLIED THOUSANDS OF YEARS AGO.

THE LABORATORIES CORELAB AND PROTECHNICS HAS DEVELOPED THIS TYPE OF TECHNOLOGIES USED BY THE OIL INDUSTRY. ALSO TODAY RADIOACTIVE BEAMS ARE USED TO BOMBARD LARGE CHEAP COLORED DIAMONDS TO CHANGE THE COLOR STRUCTURES TO WHAT ITS CALLED FANCY COLORED DIAMONDS, SELLING LATER FOR MUCH BETTER PRICE IF THEY GO UNDETECTED.

MORE THAN 12,000 YEARS AGO, IT IS VERY POSSIBLE THAT ANCIENT CIVILIZATIONS BUILT SUBMARINE CAVE DEPOSITS TO DISPOSE OF NON-RECYCLABLE TOXIC MATERIALS IN ISOLATED FAR AWAY PLACES.

OR THERE WAS A MINING REMOTE OUTPOST THAT BUILT UNDERGROUND HOUSING FACILITIES OR ALL TOGETHER.

THE LOCATION OF "NAN MADOL" COULD HAVE BEEN A IMPORTANT MINING REMOTE OUTPOST THAT USED THE QUALITY AND ABUNDANCE OF ITS NEARBY MINERALS AS THE FIRST THING ON WHICH THEIR BUILDERS WERE BASED TO LOCATE THEIR FACILITIES. THIS HAS BEEN THE CASE ALONG HISTORY WITH ALL TYPES OF MINERALS SUCH AS GOLD MINES, PRECIOUS STONES ETC.

EVERYBOY KEEPS ASKING WHY BUILT NAN MADOL IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE, THE ANSWER ITS QUITE CLEAR AND SIMPLE. THE BENTONITE, PHOSPHATE AND MANGANESE NATURAL DEPOSITS ARE ONLY THE TIP OF THE ICEBERG, THE TYPE OF MINERAL RESOURCES THAT LIE DEEPER UNDERGROUND COULD POSSIBLY BE REVEALED BY OUR PRESENT LASER SATELITE DEEP GROUND PENETRATION TECNOLOGY,

This is NOT a mystery anymore. An Armenian scientist already solved this puzzle in 2017.
Here is what these structures were made for:
In the past, aboriginal peoples of the island used to live next to the ocean, because they mostly fished. However, the water always rose during some months of the year and destroyed their houses, so the natives built these "highrises" to protect themselves of the rising ocean, and they built their houses/huts on top of these structures. The canals were built to make it possible for their canoes to navigate through to the ocean.
There is NOTHING mysterious about this coastal city.
However, these people make it so dramatic, as if the "aliens" built the structures.
Come on guys, a little bit of science, mixed with common sense will always yield you an answer.

"Why would somebody build a city out in the middle of the ocean?"

Um, people who don't wanna have their city, I don't know, invaded?

Ancient times were plagued with wars, and honestly, if I were a king living in those times, I would want my city either on an island, or a place pretty secluded, like high on a flat mountain top area.

Only way far an army to get there is to have to make its way up, which comes with complications... such as having to deal with the legendary High Ground .

Defenses are able to be placed strategically, without having to wonder if you'll have enough resources to go around, and if on an island, then hey, a decent navy could go a long way with having a mainland colony to get supplies from....

Not really a mystery, but hey, who knows, perhaps there is still something more to it than that, but my explanation seems to be pretty valid.
